node.title: Sir Simon - Repeat Until Funny, Burkini Beach - Best Western
node.description: Simon Frontzek is back with a new lp after ten years. Rudi Maier (Burkini Beach) released a new lp as well. they co-produced each other and even wrote a song together (Not Coming Home) which can be found on both albums.
node.release: Repeat Until Funny and Best Western were released on GHvC on August 27, 2021.
